WITH PD_INF AS ( SELECT T1.PD_CD , T1.PD_NM , T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 AS ITM_KND_CD , T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 AS PD_GRP_CD , T2.PD_PRP_VAL04 AS LP_USE_YN /* , T2.PD_PRP_VAL17 AS MAT_MNGT_DV_CD */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'MAT_MNGT_DV_CD', T2.PD_PRP_VAL17, 'ko') AS MAT_MNGT_DV_CD , T1.PDCT_UPRC , T1.SAP_MAT_CD , T2.PD_PRP_VAL30 AS TRNOVR_RT_OJ_YN , T2.PD_PRP_VAL21 AS CMN_PART_DV_CD /* 중수리 01 */ , T2.PD_PRP_VAL15 AS ORDNY_HV_MAT_YN /* 기초자재 Y 상시보유 */ FROM WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 /*상품기본*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 /*상품각사속성상세*/ ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD /* AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD IN ('SPP', 'SCHD', 'PDCT') */ /*상품확장속성그룹코드 CMN 공통, AFS AS, PRC 가격, STLM 결제, CNTR 계약, EXCH 교환/반품, ETC 기타, SL 매출, GO 발주, SPP 배송, ANA 분석, FEE 영업수수료, HIST 이력, SCHD 일정관리, COCN 전집, LRNN 학습/외국어, LV 학습단계, PART AS부품, FINC 재무, PDCT 판매제품*/ WHERE 1=1 AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = '4' )
SELECT V.* , ( S_71350 + S_71351 + S_71352 + S_71353 + S_71354 + S_71355 + S_71356 + S_71357 + S_71358 + S_71359 + S_71360 + S_71361 + S_71362 + S_71363 + S_71364 + S_71365 + S_71366 + S_71367 + S_71368 + S_71369 + S_71386 + S_71387 + S_71448 + S_71447 ) AS TOTAL FROM ( SELECT SAP_MAT_CD , PD_CD , PD_NM , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71350', 1)),0) AS S_71350 /* 수원 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71351', 1)),0) AS S_71351 /* 성수 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71352', 1)),0) AS S_71352 /* 일산 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71353', 1)),0) AS S_71353 /* 광명 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71354', 1)),0) AS S_71354 /* 안양 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71355', 1)),0) AS S_71355 /* 인천 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71356', 1)),0) AS S_71356 /* 수원 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71357', 1)),0) AS S_71357 /* 부산 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71358', 1)),0) AS S_71358 /* 창원 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71359', 1)),0) AS S_71359 /* 원주 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71360', 1)),0) AS S_71360 /* 청주 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71361', 1)),0) AS S_71361 /* 서대구 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71362', 1)),0) AS S_71362 /* 대전 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71363', 1)),0) AS S_71363 /* 광주 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71364', 1)),0) AS S_71364 /* 전주 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71365', 1)),0) AS S_71365 /* 제주 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71366', 1)),0) AS S_71366 /* 김해 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71367', 1)),0) AS S_71367 /* 남양주 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71368', 1)),0) AS S_71368 /* 천안 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71369', 1)),0) AS S_71369 /* 동대구 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71386', 1)),0) AS S_71386 /* 순천 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71387', 1)),0) AS S_71387 /* 포항 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71448', 1)),0) AS S_71448 /* 강서 */ , NVL(SUM(DECODE(OG_CD, '71447', 1)),0) AS S_71447 /* 진주 */ FROM ( SELECT PD_INF.SAP_MAT_CD , PD_INF.PD_CD , PD_INF.PD_NM , P1.OG_CD , P1.OG_NM FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ S1 /* 월별고객서비스대상내역 AC202 */ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL S2 /* 계약 상세 */ ON S1.CNTR_NO = S2.CNTR_NO AND S1.CNTR_SN = S2.CNTR_SN AND S1.MNGT_YM = #{baseYm} INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ P1 ON S1.MNGT_YM = P1.BASE_YM AND P1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W01','W06') /*조직유형코드 W01 P추진, W02 M추진, W03 홈마스터, W04 B2B, W05 온라인총판, W06 엔지니어, ALC 제휴채널, HR1 임직원, BND 채권, L01 라이프, X01 KLC, X02 LC전문강사*/ AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S1.FXN_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = P1.OG_TP_CD AND S1.FXN_PRTNR_NO = P1.PRTNR_NO INNER JOIN PD_INF ON S1.PDCT_PD_CD = PD_INF.PD_CD WHERE S1.PDCT_PD_CD IS NOT NULL
AND S2.SELL_TP_CD = #{sellTpCd}
AND S1.FXN_PRTNR_NO IS NOT NULL AND BFSVC_SPP_STP_RSON_CD = '00' /* AND BFSVC_TP_CD = '1' */ AND S2.SELL_TP_CD != '9'
AND S1.REQD_DT IS NULL AND S1.CAN_DT IS NULL AND S1.CPS_DT IS NULL ) GROUP BY SAP_MAT_CD , PD_CD , PD_NM ) V ORDER BY PD_CD
